statements: UPDATE HumanRightsLegislation SET legislation_year = 2020, policy_description = 'Protects the rights of all citizens' WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE HumanRightsLegislation SET policy_description = 'Ensures equal rights and opportunities' WHERE legislation_name = 'Equality Act' AND country = 'UK';
UPDATE HumanRightsLegislation SET legislation_year = 2000, policy_description = 'Amended policy details' WHERE country = 'USA' AND legislation_name = 'Equality Act';
UPDATE HumanRightsLegislation SET policy_description = 'New policy details', legislation_year = 2015 WHERE legislation_name = 'Human Rights Charter' AND country = 'Canada';
UPDATE human_rights_legislation SET country = 'USA' WHERE legislation_id = 1;
UPDATE policy_analysis SET analysis_description = 'Updated analysis description' WHERE analysis_id = 2;
UPDATE human_rights_legislation SET legislation_description = 'Updated human rights legislation description', date_enacted = '2022-08-15' WHERE legislation_id = 1;
UPDATE policy_analysis SET analysis_description = 'Revised policy analysis description', analysis_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE analysis_id = 3;
UPDATE human_rights_legislation SET description = 'Protecting human rights for all' WHERE title = 'Human Rights Act 2021';
UPDATE human_rights_analysis SET analyst_name = 'John Doe', analysis_text = 'Policy analysis is critical for decision-making' WHERE policy_id = 101;
UPDATE human_rights_legislation SET title = 'Example Legislation Title', enacted_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE human_rights_analysis SET analyst_name = 'John Doe', analysis_text = 'Detailed analysis text here.', analysis_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE analysis_id = 2
UPDATE HumanRightsLegislation SET enacted_year = 1998 WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA';
UPDATE PolicyAnalysis SET analyst_name = 'John Doe', analysis_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE legislation_id = 1;
UPDATE HumanRightsLegislation SET jurisdiction='International', enacted_year=2022 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE PolicyRecommendations SET recommendation='Increase funding for education programs' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE human_rights_legislation SET law_title = 'Updated Law Title', date_enacted = '2022-03-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE countries SET population = 10000000, region = 'Asia' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE human_rights_legislation SET law_description = 'Updated law description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE violations SET incident_date = '2022-06-15', violation_type = 'Updated Violation' WHERE id = 3;
